roleset.name: amputate, removal of a part of an entity/body
roleset.note: AMPUTATE-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from amputate.01-v)
AMPUTATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with amputate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from amputation.01-n)

example.name: ouch
example.text: A brother and sister had to have [parts of their legs and feet]-2 amputated *-2.
example.arg: -- parts of their legs and feet

example.name: Both Args
example.text: Dr.Carlton's amputation of Ravi's foot probably saved his life.
